Class PasswordValidatorTest

java.lang.Object
test.PasswordValidatorTest
@DisplayName("Password Validator Tests") public class PasswordValidatorTest extends Object
Test class for the password validation system. Tests various password requirements: uppercase, lowercase, digit, special char, and length.

    • testValidPasswords

      @Test @DisplayName("Valid passwords should pass validation") public void testValidPasswords()

    • testInvalidPasswords

      @ParameterizedTest @DisplayName("Invalid passwords should fail validation with appropriate errors") @CsvSource({"password, Upper case","PASSWORD, Lower case","Password, Numeric digits","Password1, Special character","Pw!1, Long Enough"}) public void testInvalidPasswords(String password, String expectedError)

    • testEmptyPassword

      @ParameterizedTest @DisplayName("Empty password should be rejected") @ValueSource(strings={""," "}) public void testEmptyPassword(String password)
